languages.text: While this creature has more than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, it gains +40% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, −6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and may only attack once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: While this creature has more than 50% wounds, it gains +40% armour, −6 MP, and only 1 attack per turn.
